text: "Happy Together" is a 1967 song by the 1960s American rock group The Turtles. It was originally released on the album of the same name. The members of the band who played on it were: * Howard Kaylan - Vocals * Mark Volman - Vocals * Al Nichol - Guitar * Jim Tucker - Guitar * Chip Douglas - Bass, Producer * John Barbata - Drums ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:The Turtles songs Category:Psychedelic pop songs
title: Happy Together
